title: Implementation of the Energy and Infrastructure Provisions of the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022

enrichment.summary: This executive order directs federal agencies to effectively implement the clean energy and infrastructure investments provided by the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022. It establishes a White House office to coordinate efforts and sets priorities to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, create good jobs, advance environmental justice, and promote innovation in clean energy technologies.
potential_concerns: Coordinating multiple federal agencies and offices may lead to bureaucratic delays and inefficiencies.
Ensuring the inclusion and fair access to jobs and benefits for frontline and disadvantaged communities may face implementation challenges.
Prevailing wage and union requirements may provoke opposition from some industry groups or cause delays in project execution.
